explains: n. 骑兵；装甲兵；装甲部队

sentences.en: The 3rd Cavalry went on the offensive.
sentences.cn: 第3装甲兵团继续发动进攻。

sentences.en: He was arguing with the king about the need to maintain the cavalry at full strength.
sentences.cn: 他在和国王讨论保留骑兵全部兵力的必要性。

sentences.en: The cavalry must immediately replenish the new horse.
sentences.cn: 骑兵部队必须立即补充新马。
